name: Guardian war VR
developer: 重庆焱玩网络科技有限公司
publisher: 重庆焱玩网络科技有限公司
description: This is a VR game with HTC VIVE. In the sword and magic of the world incarnate the chosen warriors, do everything to prevent the evil attack! The future of the world is in your hands!
minimum_requirements: OS: windows7sp1 Processor: 2.8GHz i5 CPU Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 960 DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 300 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: windows7sp1 Processor: 3.8GHz i7 CPU Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 980 DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 500 MB available space
